section.name: Running Clirr from the Command Line
section.p:
Clirr provides an "uberjar" download, which bundles all the necessary code, including all required libraries, into a single executable jar file. Clirr can then be run from a commandline via the command:
java -jar clirr-core-1.0-uber.jar
Running clirr with no command-line arguments will display the available options.
